book_title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe

characters.name: Lucy Pevensie
characters.description: The youngest Pevensie child who first discovers Narnia. Kind-hearted, brave, and faithful.

personality.behavior_summary: Pure-hearted girl who believes in the impossible and inspires others with her faith.
personality.motivations: To help Narnia and protect her siblings
personality.character_arc: From curious child to valiant queen

characters.name: Aslan
characters.description: The great lion and true king of Narnia. Wise, powerful, and sacrificial.

personality.behavior_summary: Majestic and awe-inspiring leader who brings hope and redemption.
personality.motivations: To free Narnia from evil and restore justice
personality.character_arc: The unchanging symbol of good and sacrifice
defining_moments: Sacrificing himself at the Stone Table

characters.name: The White Witch
characters.description: Evil ruler who has cursed Narnia with eternal winter. Cruel and manipulative.

personality.behavior_summary: Tyrannical ruler who maintains power through fear and deception.
personality.motivations: To rule Narnia forever and destroy Aslan's prophecy
personality.character_arc: From seemingly invincible tyrant to defeated enemy
